content.title: Home-town hero leads Aussie resistance - Lismore Echo
content.desc: Australia's middle order crumbled around him but South Australian Travis Head has steered Australia to stumps and within sight of India's first innings total.

content.title: M&C Saatchi and Digitas handed Tourism Australia creative and digital - mUmBRELLA*
content.desc: M&C Saatchi and Digitas have won the creative and digital accounts for Tourism Australia, Mumbrella understands. The result, which comes eight months after the creative account first went to pitch, is a huge win for M&C Saatchi, adding Tourism Australia to its client list, which includes Lexus, Commonwealth Bank, Woolworths and Plush. M&C Saatchi’s win comes after the agency lost its place on Optus’ creative roster and closed its retail division 1440. Earlier in the year the agency also merged its PR arm Hidden Characters into M&C Saatchi Sports & Entertainment. It comes at a loss for incum...
